title: Gorgeous Luxury 2 BR Apt in Backbay of Boston nr Charles River!
posting_body: ['Call or Text Jennifer @ 617-888-3343  ID#301286424  Avail NOW!!', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301286424', 'Rent: $4,500 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 07/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats & Small Dogs Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water, Water', 'This Stunning Luxurious 2 Bedroom, 1-1/2 Bath Apartment is located in a prime location in the Backbay on Beacon Street in a beautiful neighborhood and steps away from the Charles River !', 'Heat and hot water is included !', 'This Luxury Apartment offers the following:', 'o Beautiful Living Room/ Dining Area-', 'Open Floorplan with gorgeous Chandelier Lighting and10 ft Ceilings!', 'o. Modern Kitchen with Granite Countertops and Stainless Steel Appliances and Custom Cabinetry!', 'o Apartment offers Central AC and Heat  and has  a beautiful decorative Fireplace in Living Room!', 'o Gleaming Hardwood Floors throughout Unit', 'o Unit showcases a Lower Level with (2) beautiful Bedrooms and a gorgeous Bathroom', 'o Apartment also features plenty of Windows throughout and Recessed Lighting and lots of Closets!', 'o Entry of the building gives you a welcoming feel with its gorgeous luxurious look!', 'o Apt also has a private Entrance way direct into the Unit', 'Apartment features the perfect location in the Backbay of Boston !', 'o ½ mile from Copley Square, .8 mile from the Boston Commons & Boston Public Gardens', 'o Steps from the Charles River and its beautiful view of the City', 'o Convenient walk to the Prudential Center and its famous Skywalk Observatory', 'o Great Convenience to get anywhere in the great City of Boston!', 'Deposits of 1st Month, Last Month and Brokers Fee is requested and Great Credit !', 'FEATURES', 'Decorative Lighting', 'Dishwasher', 'Fireplace (Decorative)', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Large Bedrooms', 'Large Closets', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Lots of Closet Space', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Open Living Space', 'Private entrance', 'Small Pets Okay', 'Spacious', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Jennifer Millner', '617-888-3343', 'Benoit Real Estate', 'Pricing & availability subject to change.', 'The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.']
